lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: I feel it is important to end world poverty by helping grow small businesses
lender.occupational_info: I am a student in college

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: poverty needs to end.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: I am very passionate about people having opportunities to give themselves and their families a better quality of life. I also believe in people who have the means sharing those means with those who do not.
lender.occupational_info: I am trying to identify how to develop our cities in a more sustainable way and reduce people's reliance on the motor to conduct their life's work.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: People who don't have access to the financial system that the western world takes for granted need access to credit to improve their livelihood. This gives me an amazing chance to help others help themselves and learn from those whom I am helping.
lender.occupational_info: I train Coast Guard sailors from different countries around the world.

lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because: I believe that if we support women who need our help the world will become a better place

lender.name: RozAlia
lender.loan_because: small amounts make such a big difference, and it reaches people that I would never know need help.
lender.occupational_info: I help children with reading problems and contribute to the community to instill a love of reading among young children.

lender.name: Brenda
lender.loan_because: I hope I can help someone improve their lives and the lives of their families and communities.

lender.name: Trevor
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a great life.
lender.occupational_info: Doing something i love to do. =]

lender.name: Kaaralee
lender.occupational_info: I am an extensionist. I do eyelash, nail and hair extensions. I am an artist.

lender.name: Henrik
lender.loan_because: I like to motivate people with initiative that want to offer products and services to other people especially in the food/bakery sector
lender.occupational_info: As a grain mill we mill wheat and rye to flour for bakery purposes and offer all other products of bakery raw materials.

lender.name: the
lender.occupational_info: We are a family of 5 in North Carolina.

lender.name: Dianne
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Carol and Tim
lender.loan_because: We admire these courageous and creative businesses.
lender.occupational_info: I write about education issues in California.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I want to help out

lender.name: Serene
lender.loan_because: It's such a brilliant way to empower someone to change their own life, and to break the cycle of dependence on aid.
lender.occupational_info: I am a journalist and author, and have written two books.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: Its a great feeling to help people out!
lender.occupational_info: I am a student in the School of Education at Stanford University.

lender.name: Aoife
lender.loan_because: this is an incredibly well worthwhile project. I'm so pleased to be able to help in this small way.
lender.occupational_info: Mum

lender.name: Kenji
lender.loan_because: I want to help people that need it. If they can start a business then they can become self reliant. And thats the best thing that can happen to a person =]

lender.name: Emi
lender.loan_because: I can...and would like to help others

lender.name: Janny
lender.loan_because: I believe everybody deserves the chance to create a beter life for themselves.

lender.name: Nina
lender.loan_because: I have been fortunate to recieve help myself, and I would like to help those that are in need as well.
lender.occupational_info: I have had many jobs in different industries from Fashion, making wedding cakes, teaching dance to working in IT education. I should like my profession to one day be helping people accomplish their dreams.

lender.name: Cody
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with the resources to aid others in their endeavors to better their lives. I believe that helping others to help themselves is always better than charity.
lender.occupational_info: I am a member of the US Military, an organization filled with thousands who are dedicated to serving something higher than themselves and who are committed to improving the situations of others around the world through hard work and personal sacrifice.

lender.name: Samantha
lender.loan_because: How could I not?

lender.name: Ralph
lender.loan_because: Is a beautiful adventure

lender.name: Dustin
lender.loan_because: I feel obligated to help those less fortunate and those living in countries that do not offer the same opportunites as the one I live in.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: it can help give people a new life and give them that step towards getting out of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the multimedia industry, music and games.

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: it's my responsibility to help and I am much more fortunate than most of the world. "Be the change you wish to see in the world." -Gandhi
lender.occupational_info: I work with international students at a university. They come here to better their own lives and their countries with an education and I feel that my overseas loans are helping those who aren't able to study in the U.S. My vocation is being an advocate for animals; I volunteer at my local humane society weekly because I wholeheartedly believe in the power of the human-animal connection. "The least I can do is speak out for those who cannot speak for themselves." (Jane Goodall)

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: Its exciting to watch something grow, knowing that you had a part, albeit very small, in its development.

lender.name: Barry
lender.loan_because: I want to help any one who I can. I come from a very poor family so I understand the need for a loan to get started.
lender.occupational_info: I invest in the U.S. stock market and try to buy companies when their value is low and then sell the company when their value is high.

lender.name: DELIGNY
lender.loan_because: It's necessary !

lender.name: . . . s k i n
lender.loan_because: In my opinion one of the most important aspects of development is enabling people to help themselves.

lender.name: Tracy
lender.loan_because: I believe that lack of capital should not hinder an enterprising person from succeeding.

lender.name: Andrea & Thomas
lender.loan_because: it's the best to develop people's world
lender.occupational_info: Organising the day inside a regional bank

lender.name: Caroline
lender.loan_because: Don't change the world, but can to change some people's life.

lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: micro loans benefit people, not the world bank.
lender.occupational_info: Web site based software applications

lender.name: Kiruba
lender.occupational_info: I am a returned Peace Corps volunteer who served in Guinea, West Africa. I am presently a math professor at a community college.

lender.name: Brent
lender.loan_because: I believe people who work hard should be rewarded with a helping hand.
lender.occupational_info: I design new products.

lender.name: john
lender.loan_because: You have a vision and you have the will. I have a little money to help.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: I want to help others reach their goals, as I have been helped. No matter how hard you work, sometimes you need an extra hand to make things happen. Kiva is a great vehicle to offer that helping hand.
lender.occupational_info: I give massage for prevention or rehabilitation of soft tissue injuries. I am also an artist, working mostly with textiles. However, all that is secondary to taking care of my family.

lender.name: Cornelius Van Ewyk
lender.loan_because: I like to help those in need,and starving children.
lender.occupational_info: I built furniture,but am semi retired now.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I can. I'm not rich, but I'm so fortunate to have as much as I do: a secure job, warm safe place to live, all the food I want, health, and enough money to travel and spend foolishly sometimes. I'm grateful and very lucky and want to share what I can with others who haven't had as many opportunities in their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the laboratory of a large teaching hospital. We identify the bacteria (and fungi and viruses) that are making people sick and then determine which antibiotics can be used to make them well. I'm also working on a Master's in Global Public Health and hope to work towards strengthening medical laboratories in developing countries.

lender.name: Dana
lender.loan_because: I support a fair Global economy
lender.occupational_info: I work in telecommunications.

lender.name: Jose
lender.loan_because: Giving people the tools to better their lives is the kindest and most respectful way to help someone. It enriches their soul as well as their material needs
lender.occupational_info: Data processing/ Skin Care Products

lender.name: Eden
lender.loan_because: people should have the opportunity to live out of their gifts.

lender.name: Sean
lender.loan_because: This was a gift to me. I feel this is a great idea to give opportunities to people who have the heart but not the money to start or help their business grow
lender.occupational_info: I Love what I do

lender.name: Khan
lender.loan_because: I know how lucky I am when compared to most people on this planet. No-one's going to even the scales if I, and people like me, don't.
lender.occupational_info: I help make a game that lets people of all ages play with each other, no matter how far away they are, through their computers.

lender.name: thistle
lender.loan_because: life is short! We should try to help each other through it as best we can, and make the journey as sweet as possible...
lender.occupational_info: I build and run programs that help connect university graduate students with the communities around them, so that we can all learn from each other. I try to make sure that my research work also is relevant to the communities around us.

lender.name: Sim
lender.loan_because: I have had a good life and want to share it with others. This world can be a beautiful place if we try to help and respect one another.
lender.occupational_info: I have worked in the food industry most of my life ... serving coffee, baking breads, and waiting on tables. I love to travel and see the world.

lender.name: AussieDingo1983
lender.loan_because: I love the concept behind Kiva, which is helping people to help themselves, empowering them to lift themselves out of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I run a shop which I use to sell goods via the internet.

lender.name: Derek & Christine
lender.loan_because: We feel it is very important to give back. Helping others is a wonderful thing.
lender.occupational_info: We own a sign and graphics company.

lender.name: Marilee
lender.loan_because: i want to help.
lender.occupational_info: i rent and sell retro and high performance surf boards.

lender.name: Jules
lender.loan_because: I have two grandsons. I make loans every month in their names & in mine. Some day, they can see how the few dollars I've spent each month have rebounded through the years, making a difference in hundreds of lives.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: there are too many people throughout the world that need help to survive and prosper. I started loaning because my daughter believes this to be a worthwhile program. She's obviously correct... again.
lender.occupational_info: I own a food business where we sell a food item that is taken home and baked.

lender.name: Jacob
lender.loan_because: I'm so inspired by all of these entrepreneurs.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I have been a part of Kiva and believe that these connections are one step on the path to a better future.
lender.occupational_info: Dreaming big and small.

lender.name: Ayers Family
lender.loan_because: Jesus commanded, "Love your neighbor." When asked to define "neighbor," Jesus expanded the traditional meaning of the word -- defining our neighbor as anyone who is in need

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: I want to be able to change someone's life for the better.
lender.occupational_info: I work so I can see the world.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: I have 25 dollars in my bank account. I don't pretend to have any advantage over entrepreneurs in other parts of the world; in fact, they are undoubtedly more knowledgeable and world-wise than I. I hope that by lending to people in need, I might learn more about my world and about the power of love.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I want to help those who are willing to help themselves. It's one thing to give someone something in the spirit of charity, but it's an entirely different thing to help them become self-sufficient.
lender.occupational_info: I help my clients figure out challenging problems and the best way to go about solving those problems. My clients are generally concerned with how to run their businesses more effectively or efficiently.

lender.name: Leah
lender.loan_because: I want to support people to live happy lives and Kiva micro loans seem like an effective way to serve people who are motivated and able to benefit from the help.

lender.name: David & Gitte
lender.loan_because: We believe in entrepreneurship.
lender.occupational_info: immigration law

lender.name: Riley
lender.loan_because: I care!
lender.occupational_info: Student

lender.name: paula
lender.loan_because: i can...and we should....im 'poor' by north american standards...but i can still afford to help... this is my thanks to God for the blessings in my life...

lender.name: Tonia
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference for someone and hopefully impact their life for the better.
lender.occupational_info: I travel to trade shows for my client and purchase merchandise to be sold in their specialty store.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: there is so much need in the world and we can help through programs (like this one) where the money gets directly to a partner.
lender.occupational_info: i'm a jazz pianist and composer who also teaches at a university.

lender.name: Taryl
lender.loan_because: The joy of giving. Enpowering women. All I can offer is an opportunity - like so many opportunities I have been given.
lender.occupational_info: Managing a small business. Must attend to income, payment of bills, employees, taxes, supplies, computers and basic office upkeep.

lender.name: The Haskell Family
lender.loan_because: This initial donation is a gift to our daughter Lily, for her first birthday. I think this site is a wonderful idea and thought it would be a great thing to start for Lily. We can do it each year and as she gets older, she can help pick who she would like to help.

lender.name: Andrew & Vicky Crompton
lender.loan_because: This is a small way to others a helping hand.

lender.name: Neville
lender.loan_because: because I see the need ,and it help people to be self reliance
lender.occupational_info: I operate a small microfinance company in Kingston Jamaica, W.I. and I know the impact of what a small amount of money can do for a family.

lender.name: Rod & Joan
lender.loan_because: We are entrepeneurs, and have found the energy and means to live as we choose for 27 years. We enjoy what we do, and love our lives together. We hope our support will encourage others to discover the same spirit in themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: Our home is our santuary -- we enjoy the warmth of the interior and the continual surprise of the garden. Rod helps others create interiors which inspire the same feeling of warmth. Joan designs beaded jewelry based on vintage pieces she has discovered.

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: It's a great feeling to be able to give something, however small it may seem!
lender.occupational_info: I

lender.name: dani martin
lender.occupational_info: I study economy in Spain

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: As a small business owner, I know how important itnis to have capital to grow one's business, and I want to help those in developing countries.
lender.occupational_info: I have a stationery and shipping business.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.occupational_info: Software Developer

lender.name: Carole and Len
lender.occupation: Speech Pathologist and Retired HS Science Teacher
lender.loan_because: Together with our family and friends, we have pooled our resources to make this loan in memory of Carole's dad, Vincent ,who recently passed away at age 89. Vincent had an extraordinary work ethic and we feel this small contribution would be a wonderful way to honor and remember him.

lender.name: Jeroen
lender.loan_because: it is the most personal way of helping people while they keep their independance

lender.name: Kim
lender.occupational_info: I ask many people questions, and they answer the questions on the internet or on paper. I then I group the information into a report, and someone uses that information to make decisions.

lender.name: Ragnhild
lender.occupational_info: I'm at university, studying to become a psychologist.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.occupational_info: I help tell people's stories.

lender.name: Ian
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: self employed carpenter type

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: Helping others is what life is all about!

lender.name: Alice
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers and the Internet, helping people connect online and learn more abou technology and business.

lender.name: Cara
lender.loan_because: Everyone has a dream and in this program and I can watch a dream come true.
lender.occupational_info: In my current employment, I help passionate high school art students to pursue their dreams by helping them in applying to college.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I also need money from time to time and without people helping people our species will never get ahead. May all our generosity cross all borders and boundaries
lender.occupational_info: small engine mechanic and shop owner helping others here and there

lender.name: Wendy
lender.loan_because: together, we can make the world a better place for all people

lender.name: Antonio
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference
lender.occupational_info: I perform IT audits which means that I am hired by several clients to assess their information systems controls and determine whether they are appropriate according to their policies and standards.

lender.name: Tony
lender.loan_because: I support good hardworking people that have the initiative to succeed.

lender.name: Caroline C
lender.loan_because: I want to see small entrepreneurs succeed.

lender.name: Darrel
lender.loan_because: Poverty cannot be overcome until all people can live productive lives.
lender.occupational_info: I help ensure medicines are safe before they are put onto the market.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I can and I care. I really want to give others the opportunity to be successful!
lender.occupational_info: non-profit education.

lender.name: Rebekah & Sophiana
lender.loan_because: It was a gift to us for Christmas from our Aunt Juliana
lender.occupational_info: Elementary School Students

lender.name: Jen Clessas
lender.loan_because: I value small businesses and believe that economic growth of developing nations can occur through small, community involved entrepreneurship.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an English language school answering phones and helping students with all their needs.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: God has given me so much, I want to give back.

lender.name: Holly
lender.loan_because: I used to live in a developing country and I've seen what a difference an opportunity such as this can make in someone's life.

lender.name: Trinity Menlo Park CA
lender.loan_because: We care about others

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: Giving in this way is an extension of a Christmas gift in memory of my father. My family has a traveling gift called the Kindness Cart. The recipient has the cart for one year to continue random acts of kindness in memory of my father. At the end of the year a report is given to the family and passed on to another. Loans made here work on a similar principle; kindness is paid forward to help others.

lender.name: Ashley
lender.loan_because: I want to help others who are in a less fortunate position not by choice.

lender.name: Sasa Family
lender.loan_because: We are very grateful and blessed in our lives and fortunate to have such a wonderful family. We want to help enrich the lives of other people, to help give them a chance for a better life. We want our children to know that there are other people around the world that work hard for their families and that we can offer them a helping hand so that they can live a better life too.
lender.occupational_info: We work hard every day to keep up with every day demands, but it is worth every bit of sweat. My husband came to this country 29 years ago with no money and could not speak a word of English. Today he is a successful business man and as you can see we have a beautiful family.

lender.name: Tecknomage
lender.loan_because: I want to participate, in a small way, in making a better world for people.

lender.name: Yasmine
lender.loan_because: Empowering someone to help themsleves is the best gift you can give
lender.occupational_info: Help corporations solve their financial and operational problems

lender.name: Samantha
lender.loan_because: I am thankful for the opportunities I am given as a young female in the United States and this is my way of giving back to the international community :)
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at New York University studying Economics, History, and Pre-business.

lender.name: Eva
lender.loan_because: I got a gift certificate for Christmas.
lender.occupational_info: I go to school for most of the day and then do homework when I get home. I also watch TV and I love to shop at the mall.

lender.name: Ciaran/Cecelia
lender.loan_because: we can and we want to help others. We know that when we give, our help will help other kids through assisting their parents in their dreams!
lender.occupational_info: We are a brother and sister wanting to find a way to start making a difference in the world.

lender.name: Jack & Mary
lender.occupational_info: I teach college level economics, and how that subject applies to U.S. and global economies.

lender.name: Jen
lender.loan_because: I am a woman in a man's field and understand how difficult it can be to establish your career choice. God blessed me with a heart to help and give to others, even when I needed help myself.
lender.occupational_info: I design and coordinate the building of specality and handicap homes.

lender.name: Denise
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone should have a chance to make a better life for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am a homeschooling parent to 2 teenagers. I believe in teaching my children more about the world than what the public school system teachs them.

lender.name: Amy
lender.occupation: Director of Publications and Media Relations
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: Microfinance is one of the best ways to eliminate poverty throughout the world.

lender.name: Avinash_Lajja
lender.loan_because: I consider myself fortunate to have ability to make a micro contribution towards someone, who is doing all the hardwork and putting in all the efforts to meet their necessity .
lender.occupational_info:
I am a Hardware Engineer, residing in Silicon Vally "Mecca of Entrepreneur"
I am a young entrepreneur myself and I understand the value of funds to make your dream a reality.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: It makes a difference to individuals.
lender.occupational_info: I teach in a medical school. We have amazing students that want to go out and help people.

lender.name: Kellen
lender.loan_because: i care

lender.name: Russell
lender.loan_because: It's only right...I'm a lucky guy and I don't need more than what's required to live comfortably.
lender.occupational_info: The way it should be for everybody who has more than what they need.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: all of us have needed a hand at one point or another in our lives.

lender.name: Corey
lender.loan_because: I want to support women making a difference in the world, as they embody the feminine principle of nurturing and receptivity.
lender.occupational_info: I teach astrology as a self-awareness tool and love to support people and organizations in transition.

lender.name: Everett
lender.loan_because: I want to help someone with my money.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a TV News Photographer at a local TV station in Denver Colorado

lender.name: MrsA
lender.loan_because: There is no greater dignity than that of one who possesses self reliance. Enabling people in poorer nations to pull themselves up 'by the boot straps' allows them that dignity.

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: Je peux/I can.

lender.name: Gunnar
lender.loan_because: People that dont have enough money should have a chance to do what makes them happy and makes them and their families a living.
lender.occupational_info: My work is pretty simple. I go to school every day and learn stuff.

lender.name: Bruce
lender.loan_because: the least I can do, and it empowers people!
lender.occupational_info: Involved in drug safety research studies after the drug is on the market.

lender.name: JamesFord
lender.loan_because: I love to invest.
lender.occupational_info: Every Saturday I play hockey.

lender.name: Anita
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in as many people's lives as I'm capable of.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a DSP (direct support professional) in a group home supporting 4 individuals with disabilities, helping them lead a life as normal as possible, integrated into the community. I'm also an Entrepreneur.

lender.name: Kaizad
lender.loan_because: it helps.

lender.name: bailey
lender.loan_because: this is the way i can give back to the world for so much it has given me.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an average human being, out so make something of myself. Not many people do anything to make a difference. So We have to make up for them.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I want to help others create a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Catholic Christian minister on a university campus in the midwestern United States.

lender.name: The Nelsons
lender.occupation: Public Servant, Educator, Non-Profit Mngt, Student
lender.loan_because: our daughter gave us a KIVA loan for Christmas so we could start lending together. She believes so much in microfinance and wanted us as a family to see the impact we could make together.
lender.occupational_info: Dad works with the Police Department managing property. Mom educates junior highers (she's a saint), Sarah works with a local non profit and Daniel is a full time student looking forward to changing the world.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be able to help, so why not.
lender.occupational_info: I evaluate environmental conditions of properties before they are purchased or developed

lender.name: Faye
lender.loan_because: After visiting my missionary daughter in Bolivia and Peru, I was amazed at the spirit, love and vitality of the people I met. They need so little to make such a big difference.
lender.occupational_info: I write for an on-line newsletter that keeps people informed regarding the legislation of our state. I am also involved in local political consulting and campain work.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: It's a hand up not a hand out.

lender.name: Karen Anne
lender.loan_because: I am able to.

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: It makes a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I love to share information and help people find the information and resources that will improve their lives, and the books and movies that will provide them with entertainment. Parents - read to your children! You will open up a whole new world for them.

lender.name: Joe & Margarita
lender.loan_because: It is a good thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: Retired

lender.name: Valerie
lender.occupational_info: I am studying finance and hope to become a stock trader in New York City.

lender.name: Claire
lender.occupational_info: Corporate problem solving

lender.name: Deb
lender.loan_because: Even small acts of support and kindness can make a difference. I hope to help women around the world develop businesses, create financial freedom, provide for their families, build self-esteem and become empowered.
lender.occupational_info: I am a writer and producer of televsion and web projects of all sorts, many are for children.

lender.name: Eliza
lender.loan_because: we are all connected, and many people can do many more amazing things with money than I. Travel has given me excitement for learning and partnering across cultures and perspectives. We all have so much to learn and share.
lender.occupational_info: I work with a US based non-profit that develops teaching and learning tools for international education and vocational programs.

lender.name: Jentry
lender.loan_because: So little goes so far
lender.occupational_info: Designing rockets for human space travel

lender.name: Debbie
lender.loan_because: I live and work in a developing country in South America with rural indigenous. My daughters have worked with women in India and Uganda. We want to help women who work hard to provide for their families.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who are helping themselves here via KIVA. I also enjoy donating to children's homes and abuse shelters. I feel very fortunate in my life and want to help others feel the same.
lender.occupational_info: Music Industry-Live performance

lender.name: Art
lender.loan_because: It feels good, I can, and it just might make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I get up and go to work 5 days a week then I rest for 2 days and then I get and do it all over again and again and again.... As my out of work friend in Nicaragua says "que galan" or "how nice".

lender.name: Casey
lender.loan_because: My grandpa gave me a gift card to help other people

lender.name: Kelli
lender.loan_because: I've been fortunate enough to travel to many corners of the world, and I've seen first hand how difficult it can be to work and live in developing countries. I know that every small gesture can make a BIG difference for those in need, and until I can do more, I'm so happy I can help in this way.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I like to see people achieve their business goals.
lender.occupational_info: I write programs for computers.

lender.name: Mary Anne & Wilfried
lender.loan_because: It is so easy ...

lender.name: Shahzad
lender.loan_because:
I want people to get on their feet and be able to support themselves.
I always want people be able to self-sustain so that they do not have to spread their hand and hurt their self-respect.
We Kiva Muslim group should have a common strategy to loaning funds.
lender.occupational_info: I own couple of businesses and Alhumdolillah am doing good.

lender.name: Davey Coalition
lender.loan_because: We loan instead of giving Christmas gifts. We felt it was a more meaningful use of our money.
lender.occupational_info: 2 teachers, 1 retired teacher, 1 social worker, 1 police officer, 1 fire fighter, and one retired homemaker

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: I can and hopefully it will make the world a little bit better.
lender.occupational_info: I help people find and purchase homes.

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: It will make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher of third grade students who are 8 and 9 years old.

lender.name: Rose Anne
lender.loan_because: I think it is great to support someone in their choices and perhaps even help them fulfill their dreams. At the same time, I find it very inspiring to see how creative people are, in finding ways to make their life sustainable, hopefully by doing something they love.
lender.occupational_info: I work in Guest Relations at Mike Wiegele Helicopter Skiing. Together with all the other staff I try to exceed guest expectations on their holiday. Quite often this holiday is a reward that someone gives themselves, and sometimes people save money for years in order to make this trip happen.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I want to establish a global community.

lender.name: Sue & Mary
lender.loan_because: We belong to a Mother's group that started when our children were young. We have been meeting for close to twenty years, but recently started a Christmas Gift exchange, We are happy to lend as our gift to eachother, hoping to make a difference in other women's lives.

lender.name: Max and Alison
lender.loan_because: We were gifted the opportunity to loan, so we're loaning by the generosity of others
lender.occupational_info: I work in an emergency department helping sick and injured individuals, and my wife teaches children from 1-6th grades.

lender.name: Ethan
lender.loan_because: I have a gift certificate

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: "It is in giving that we receive." - St. Francis of Assisi
lender.occupational_info: I help people apply to university so that they can pursue and education.

lender.name: Edgar & Sylvia
lender.loan_because: We believe we can all make a difference and help this world be a better place. This is a great opportunity to start making a difference.

lender.name: Ingrid
lender.loan_because: I feel that my life is blessed in so many ways. I feel that that some of what I earn must be put back into my global community and my hope is that this small effort make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I am very fortunate in my experiences - business analysis, process analysis, process design, training development & delivery, documentation, project management, Administration, and more.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I have too much. Others have too little.

lender.name: Sriram
lender.loan_because: I want to enable these budding entrepreneur's to earn a sustainable income for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I detect and notify broken software code!!!

lender.name: Bradley
lender.loan_because: It provides me the opportunity to help others better themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I build websites for companies allowing them to sell merchandise on the internet.

lender.name: Fawn
lender.loan_because: Paying it forward to our fellow brothers and sisters in the one race, the human race.
lender.occupational_info: I work helping women to feel better about themselves:)

lender.name: Paul and Doug
lender.loan_because: We've been lending for a few years. It's very rewarding to take money from paid loans and reinvest to help others.
lender.occupational_info: Paul greets people and does computer office work for a hospital Doug works with computer management in a medium sized print shop.

lender.name: Patricia/Jeff
lender.occupational_info: Jeff is a supply teacher Patricia is a Supervisor of a program for adults with developmental disabilites.

lender.name: Daniel&Lisabeth
lender.loan_because: We are all members of "One Human Family"

lender.name: Teresa
lender.loan_because: I want to. Not because someone takes it from me (in taxes and gives to their own cause) but I chose to help you.
lender.occupational_info: I teach. I teach my children and now my grandchildren. I help where I can.

lender.name: Marit
lender.loan_because: individuals make a difference.

lender.name: Ksenia
lender.loan_because: I find it deeply gratifying to unite with others to help someone. I see Kiva as using capitalism responsibly to improve the quality of life for other hardworking people throughout the world. On a financial level, the small amount I lend does not adversely affect me - it'd be sitting around in my account anyway.
lender.occupational_info: I teach teenagers, their parents & their community how to improve their health & communication skills. The population consists of recent immigrants to the US.

lender.name: ANNE
lender.loan_because: because everyone needs a helping hand and I think this is a fantastic idea.
lender.occupational_info: I am in charge of the accounting department for a hospital. My staff and I ensure the bills get paid and everything is properly accounted for.

lender.name: Karen & Cory Shepard
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a break at some point in their life. I LOVE being a part of such a caring/empowering organization.
lender.occupational_info: Helping people with spinal pain and teaching exercises to support their back.

lender.name: Pella I CRC YACS
lender.loan_because: We love Jesus, and we want to help other people around the world!
lender.occupational_info: We're a group of 25 young people and leaders who meet weekly to serve and praise the Lord. YACS stands for Young Adults in Christ's Service.

lender.name: Pheydra
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: I know my money is well invested--going to hardworking individuals who can use it to help themselves. I feel like I'm really helping out!
lender.occupational_info: Legal Secretary

lender.name: Nicole and Rob
lender.loan_because: we are all ONE

lender.name: Larry
lender.loan_because: I want to do my part to make a small difference in the lives of those in need.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that performs medical laboratory testing. I work in the computer department of this company to make sure that our sales force has the information it needs to provide good service to our customers.

lender.name: Shawn
lender.loan_because: in helping each other we help ourselves.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: I believe in paying it forward...one never knows when one will need the help of a friend, or a stranger.
lender.occupational_info: I am in the midst of a career change. I have spent about 30 years in the entertainment business; Rock n Roll concerts, figure skating and gymnastics shows and tours, and some television work. I am transitioning to the field of psychology. I have just finished graduate school and I am working with an under served community in the area I live in.

lender.name: Thao
lender.loan_because: I believe in karma & that everyone can help the less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I attend the University of Houston & work at a dentist's office as a receptionist on the days I don't have class.

lender.name: Enrique
lender.loan_because: When I started my business many years ago I was helped by people and realized how important it is to be able to receive help at certain points in life.
lender.occupational_info: I am semi-retired but work in a number of projects assisting companies wanting to work with Latinos in the USA or in Latin America.

lender.name: Jeanne & Gary
lender.loan_because: we are blessed to be able to do so, and it follows the spiritual law of giving and receiving.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: Money is freedom, and you can't make money without access to money
lender.occupational_info: I help sell professional services to large corporations.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: It just makes so much sense to do this.

lender.name: Joe Stehly
lender.loan_because: our dollar goes so much further in other parts of the world
lender.occupational_info: Solar system exploration

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: college students are always short on money, but at $25 it just makes sense.

lender.name: Wilson Girls
lender.loan_because: I wish for a better quality of life across the world, especially in third world countries where living conditions are unimaginable compared to Ohio USA. My daughters inspire me to help women become successful.
lender.occupational_info: Technology support for a global food company.

lender.name: Veronica
lender.loan_because: I feel the need to share the many blessings I have received and touch someone's life who is less fortunate than I. Kiva is my choice organization because I can see where my money is helping.

lender.name: Xin
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in someone's life. Specifically I want to see other women succeed in business and life.
lender.occupational_info: I write things everyday and compile them together.

lender.name: Larry
lender.loan_because: it creates a future now.
lender.occupational_info: I advise clients and (their) health professional on how to use medicines for optimum benefit and least risk .

lender.name: john
lender.loan_because: I care about people and making the world a better place

lender.name: Jenny Poulin
lender.occupational_info: Jenny: I study the organic chemistry of works of art and archaeological objects.

lender.name: Hadiya
lender.loan_because: If I have the means, whether it is $1 or $500 I will give freely what was once given to me.
lender.occupational_info: I am a newly graduated university student. I currently work for my cities public library

lender.name: Scott
lender.occupation: web strategy, website creation, web marketing
lender.loan_because: It creates an economic stimulus from the ground up and empowers people to improve their lives and their community.
lender.occupational_info: I create websites for businesses and provide web marketing services.

lender.name: GetData
lender.loan_because: our company loves helping poeple!

lender.name: Jack
lender.loan_because: I feel the money could be used to benfit people that need it more.
lender.occupational_info: I study graphic design and I am a Wrestler in the making.

lender.name: stephanie
lender.loan_because: It's an easy way to assist and uplift others. We are here to be of service in any way we can.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a small community hospital and I am also a practitioner of energy healing techniques.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I want to help people more directly, especially women. Statistics show that when women get the money there's a higher chance it will be used productively and benefit their children. Kiva is a way to connect the world on a personal level.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a Studio Art major at Willamette University

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: I have been given so much...

lender.name: Bonnie
lender.loan_because: I love people and because microloans work!
lender.occupational_info: I work in a business office assisting the leaders of our company. I work 9 hours and travel 2 1/2 hours to work, 5 days per week. I have a family with a husband, 2 adult children and 2 dogs and 2 cats. I love my days off!

lender.name: patricia
lender.loan_because: I'm looking for ways to make small differences in the world
lender.occupational_info: I am retired, enjoy gardening and being with my family

lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: I have personally witnessed the positive impact of microfinance loans on poor communities in Southeast Asia.
lender.occupational_info: I work in humanitarian aid and specialize in the Southeast Asian Region.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: The kindness of the Cambodian people during my time there has left a lifelong impression. This is but a small way that I can say Thank You.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a software company that provides business solutions to manufacturers to help reduce costs and be more competitive.

lender.name: Bunco Group Marin
lender.loan_because: Our Bunco group likes to give back each year.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: I want to help the global community.
lender.occupational_info: I write books for kids.

lender.name: Jillany
lender.loan_because: I can only keep what I give away.

lender.name: Sally G. Cole
lender.loan_because: Access to capital is empowering. I hope that by helping empower people in their business lives that they'll have more influence to promote transparency, free markets and rule of law in their home countries.

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: People trying to get ahead should not have to pay absurd amounts of interest to " Loan sharks"
lender.occupational_info: Looking after and breeding beef cattle and sheep.

lender.name: The Najarian Family
lender.loan_because: A little support can go a long way for those that are willing to work.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I can and I should.

lender.name: Fabio Rosa
lender.loan_because: I believe that, even with this very modest amount of money, I can make a huge impact in the lives of people in the poorest places of the world. I can become a banker to those people and can monitor their progress. And people in their neighborhoods will see and they will look for micro-loans, and have their own ideas, so I can give them a chance to raise their kids with dignity, send them to school, and live better lives. And in troubled places like Afghanistan, we marginally increase the chance that peace can prevail, because people will see there is a positive alternative to conflict.
lender.occupational_info: I develop information systems (software) at a public company owned by the Federal Government of Brazil. These software supports brazilian public administration. Our government clients are: Ministry of Finance, Ministry of Planning and Budget, Civil Cabinet of Republic Presidency, Ministry of Transportation, Ministry of Communication and Ministry of Education, among others. I am also involved in labour movement, being a member of a regional trade union of IT workers' board of directors.

lender.name: IMAGEANGELS
lender.loan_because: Microfinance is compelling, practical, and is a great step forward in global assistance for those who need funding. Its giving a hand up for those who need it most, and proactively encouraging more entrepreneurs to take the next step to self sufficiency. Microfinance is logical, fast and cost effective. One small loan can make a big difference to a family.
lender.occupational_info: SALES and ART Service.

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: I want to teach my children about giving and the power of one person to help another person.
lender.occupational_info: I answer emergency phone calls from people who need help. I also send the police officers, fire departments, and the ambulances to help them.

lender.name: Christy
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Karen and Gery
lender.loan_because: We are blessed and like this opportunity to help individual families improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: We were both career public health professionals.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: Partageons notre richesse avec des gens honnêtes en besoin...GÉNIAL
lender.occupational_info: Je travaillais en crédit pour une banque québécoise

lender.name: Doug
lender.loan_because: I hope to help motivated people realize their ambition and succeed in their ventures so they can become Kiva lenders too!
lender.occupational_info: I work for a large engineering company in Australia. My team looks after the computer systems on mining, road building and construction projects.
